00052     public function AddContent ( $content )
00053     // Mode d'emploi :
00054     //add raw XHTML $content to the current content of the body.
00055         // content of the page is value associated to the tag TAG_CONTENT
00056         //
00057     // Contrat :
00058     //raw XHTML must be correct
00059     {
00060                 $this->AddToTag ( self::TAG_CONTENT, $content );
00061     } //----- End of AddContent

00063     public function SetContent ( $content )
00064     // Mode d'emploi :
00065     //set the content of the page with the given $content
00066         //

00068         //

00072                 $temp = new Template ();

00074                 
00075         $this->SetTag ( self::TAG_CONTENT, $temp );
00076     } //----- End of SetContent
00077

00079     // Mode d'emploi :

00083     // Contrat :

00088

00092         //
00093     // Contrat :
00094     //raw XHTML must be correct
00095     {
00096                 $temp = new Template ();
00097                 $temp->SetMaquette ( $content );
00098                 
00099         $this->SetTag ( self::TAG_PARAMS, $temp );
